constraints.err: End time cannot be less than the start time

fields.hint: Start time of topical cream application
End time of topical cream application

constraints.err: End time cannot be less than the start time

fields.label: Description of intraoperative adverse events (Excessive bleeding)

options.text: More Bleeding than usual but easily controlled
Bleed Requires pressure dressing to control
Blood transfussion/transffered to another facility required

fields.label: Description of intraoperative adverse events (Excessive skin removal)

options.text: Adds time or material needs to the procedure, but does not result in any discernible adverse condition
Skin is tight, but additional operative work not necessary
Requires re-operation or transfer to another facility to correct the problem

fields.label: Description of intraoperative adverse events (Injury to penis)

options.text: Mild bruising or abrasion, not requiring treatment
Bruising or abrasion of the glans or shaft of the penis requiring pressure dressing or additional surgery to control
Part or all of the glans or shaft of the penis severed

fields.label: Description of intraoperative adverse events (Anaesthetic-related event)

options.text: Reaction to anaesthetic requiring medical treatment in clinic, but not transfer to another facility
Anaphylaxis or other reaction requiring transfer to another facility
Displacement of the device after which no other treatment needed beyond routine post-removal wound care.
Displacement of the device that requires any treatment more than routine post-operative wound care but does not meet severe criteria.

Displacement of the device, including intentional movement of device by the client and/or self-removal, that requires surgical intervention, hospitalization, or transfer to another facility to clinically manage.

fields.hint: What was the nature of AE
